resources.string:
"This screen shows the user and the picture's location.
 Buttons:
 Galapagos: centers the map to the Galapagos Islands
 New route: the app will monitor your location and the camera's activity in order to show new pictures on the map
 Camera: opens the camera
 Attractions: downloads from Ikiam's server some of the most important attractions of Ecuador
 Species: downloads from Ikiam's server some of the most important species of Ecuador
 Compass: shows information about your geographic location and a compass
 Type: changes map type (terrain, satellite, roadsâ€¦)
 Clean: removes all map markers"
